name: Santa Slot Christmas FREE – Spin the Holiday Candy Cane Bonus Casino Wheel , Big Win Jackpot Blitz
name_original: Santa Slot Christmas FREE – Spin the Holiday Candy Cane Bonus Casino Wheel , Big Win Jackpot Blitz
description:
Santa Slot Christmas is the Hottest New Slot Machine game to hit the market. Sweet Payouts of up to 200,000 coins. Place your bets, spin the wheel and win lots of coins!

Features Include:
- iOS 7 Ready
- Beautiful HD Graphics
- Awesome sound effects!
- Compete with your friends to win the most coins with Game Center Leaderboards.
- Daily Bonus Win
- Bonus Spins and Bonus Games

HOURS OF GREAT ENTERTAINMENT!!!
